name: Chicken Parmigiana
instructions: Cut pepper and shallot into 1/4 inch slices
Season chicken with salt and pepper
Coat chicken with mayo, all over
Heat a pan over medium heat, then add oil
Fry chicken until golden brown, 3-4 minutes per side; note the chicken won’t be fully cooked until the broiling step
Place fried chicken on foil-lined baking sheet
Spoon marinara sauce over chicken and sprinkling parmesan on top
Broil chicken on middle rack until cheese is golden-brown and cooked through (74˚C/165˚F), 4-6 min
While chicken broils, toss peppers, shallots, half of the italian seasoning with oil on another baking sheet. Broil on bottom rack until tender, 4-6 minutes
Meanwhile, whisk mustard, vinegar, 1 tbsp oil, sugar, salt, and pepper
Toss veggies, spinach, and dressing together
